alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Recently the astrologers of New York City petitioned for the suppression of less learned soothsayers. The Commissioner of Markets, as the guardian of advertising, declared that he would investigate 'these phonies claiming to be astrologers.'"

- New York Times, Aug 8, 1962.
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Phony Astrologers
